Class Token

java.lang.Object
Token
public class Token extends Object
Token will create player objects that are then passed to Board() to draw the Chutes and Ladders playspace.

  • Constructor Details

    • Token

      public Token()
      Default constructor for Token. Serves no purpose at this time.

    • Token

      public Token(char initialInput, int playerX, int playerY)
      Token constructor for creating players.
      Parameters:
      initialInput - stores the initial of the player.
      playerX - stores the x (j) coordinate of the player.
      playerY - stores the y (i) coordinate of the player.

  • Method Details

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(int newX, int newY)
      setPosition mutates the positional values of a player.
      Parameters:
      newX - assigns new x (j).
      newY - assigns new y (i).
